notes: This map illustrates potential satellite-detected damaged structures in Baracoa town,  in Guantanamo Province, Cuba. The UNITAR-UNOSAT analysis used a Pleiades satellite image, acquired on the 11 October 2016, and identified 3,147 damaged structures inside the town of Baracoa.This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR-UNOSAT.
